ygData.subject: Re: Ore in Neriak
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a guy in a shop in Neriak Commons near the bank.  I can t remember the name of the shop, but it has a big aquarium, and they guy is on the lower
ygData.messageBody:
There is a guy in a shop in Neriak Commons near the bank. I can't remember
the name of the shop, but it has a big aquarium, and they guy is on the
lower level.


-----Original Message-----
